desc: Livewire Systems is a Sound and Communication Company based in Blackburn, Lancashire in the UK. We design, supply, install and commission sound, emergency public address, induction loop, privacy sound masking and intercom systems. Our systems can be found in sports grounds, churches, schools, mosques and warehouses.

layout.text: Sound and Communications. Installation, Maintenance, Servicing and Outdoor Events

We understand the importance of having a sound and communication system that correctly works every time. Whether you're looking for a new installation, or you're wanting to update or repair your existing system, our team are here to help you and your business.
